TOOLTIPS.USE: List of Workspaces using the Application

TOOLTIPS.SLOT: Areas in UI components where you want to have special functionality. This is assigned when used in Workspaces.

TOOLTIPS.APP_ID: Unique ID - base identifier for this App
TOOLTIPS.APP_TYPE: Type of the App: UI Component or Microservice
TOOLTIPS.PRODUCT_NAME: Name of the Produkt the App is assigned to
TOOLTIPS.REMOTE_NAME: Entry point of JavaScript file used by WebComponents
TOOLTIPS.CLASSIFICATIONS: Comma-separated list of terms to classify the App, e.g. Game, Tool etc. Can be used for filtering.
TOOLTIPS.CONTACT: Contact to the provider (email address or similar)
TOOLTIPS.ICON_NAME: Name of the icons from the PrimeNG icon library. Used, for example, as a default icon for menu entries
TOOLTIPS.GROUP.REMOTE_MODULE: Details of the remote module to be used
TOOLTIPS.GROUP.LOCAL_MODULE: Details of the module's local registration
TOOLTIPS.GROUP.INTERNALS: More details of object management and usage
TOOLTIPS.DEPRECATED: If set, then this App is marked as obsolete. It can currently be used but will no longer be available in the future.
TOOLTIPS.DEPRECATED_SEARCH: This App is marked as deprecated. It can currently be used but will no longer be available in the future.
TOOLTIPS.UNDEPLOYED: If set, this App can no longer be used. Further use leads to error messages.
TOOLTIPS.UNDEPLOYED_SEARCH: This App is no longer usable. Further use leads to error messages.
TOOLTIPS.OPERATOR: If set, the App was created by automation. All changes will be lost during the next deployment.

ENDPOINT.NAME: Name
ENDPOINT.CELL_EDITING_MESSAGE: Data entry and changes are made directly in the table.

TOOLTIPS.NAME: Unique name of the UI Endpoint
TOOLTIPS.PRODUCT_NAME: Name of the application where UI endpoints are offered
TOOLTIPS.APP_NAME: Microfrontend that provides the UI endpoint

CRITERIA.NAME: Name or display name of the Application

TOOLTIPS.NAME: Unique name of the Application. Cannot be changed as it is used as a reference.
TOOLTIPS.PROVIDER: Provider information, should be included in the deployment descriptor (Helm chart)
TOOLTIPS.OPERATOR: If set, the Application was created by automation. All changes will be lost during the next deployment.
TOOLTIPS.IMAGE_URL: URL for an image outside the Application Store
TOOLTIPS.BASE_PATH: The basic path through which the Application can be accessed. It must be unique across all Applications
TOOLTIPS.ICON_NAME: Name of the icons from the PrimeNG icon library. Used, for example, as a default icon for menu entries
TOOLTIPS.CLASSIFICATIONS: Comma-separated list of terms to classify the Application, e.g. Game, Tool etc. Can be used for filtering
TOOLTIPS.UNDEPLOYED: If set, then this Application can no longer be used. Further use of its apps leads to error messages.
TOOLTIPS.UNDEPLOYED_SEARCH: This Application can no longer be used. Further use of its apps leads to error messages.
